explicit

Class CTMDPModelChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • prism.PrismComponent
      • explicit.StateModelChecker
        • explicit.NonProbModelChecker
          • explicit.ProbModelChecker
            • explicit.CTMDPModelChecker

  • public class CTMDPModelChecker
extends ProbModelChecker
    Explicit-state model checker for continuous-time Markov decision processes (CTMDPs).

      • computeBoundedUntilProbs

        public ModelCheckerResult computeBoundedUntilProbs(CTMDP ctmdp,
                                                   java.util.BitSet remain,
                                                   java.util.BitSet target,
                                                   double t,
                                                   boolean min)
                                            throws PrismException
        Compute bounded until probabilities. i.e. compute the min/max probability of reaching a state in target, within time t, and while remaining in states in @{code remain}.
        Parameters:
        ctmdp - The CTMDP
        remain - Remain in these states (optional: null means "all")
        target - Target states
        t - Bound
        min - Min or max probabilities (true=min, false=max)
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeBoundedReachProbs

        public ModelCheckerResult computeBoundedReachProbs(CTMDP ctmdp,
                                                   java.util.BitSet remain,
                                                   java.util.BitSet target,
                                                   double t,
                                                   boolean min,
                                                   double[] init,
                                                   double[] results)
                                            throws PrismException
        Compute bounded probabilistic reachability.
        Parameters:
        ctmdp - The CTMDP
        remain - Remain in these states (optional: null means "all")
        target - Target states
        t - Time bound
        min - Min or max probabilities for (true=min, false=max)
        init - Initial solution vector - pass null for default
        results - Optional array of size b+1 to store (init state) results for each step (null if unused)
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeBoundedReachProbsOld

        public ModelCheckerResult computeBoundedReachProbsOld(CTMDP ctmdp,
                                                      java.util.BitSet remain,
                                                      java.util.BitSet target,
                                                      double t,
                                                      boolean min,
                                                      double[] init,
                                                      double[] results)
                                               throws PrismException
        Compute bounded reachability/until probabilities. i.e. compute the min/max probability of reaching a state in target, within time t, and while remaining in states in @{code remain}.
        Parameters:
        ctmdp - The CTMDP
        remain - Remain in these states (optional: null means "all")
        target - Target states
        t: - Time bound
        min - Min or max probabilities (true=min, false=max)
        init: - Initial solution vector - pass null for default
        results: - Optional array of size b+1 to store (init state) results for each step (null if unused)
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeReachProbs

        public ModelCheckerResult computeReachProbs(CTMDP ctmdp,
                                            java.util.BitSet target,
                                            boolean min)
                                     throws PrismException
        Compute reachability probabilities. i.e. compute the min/max probability of reaching a state in target.
        Parameters:
        ctmdp - The CTMDP
        target - Target states
        min - Min or max probabilities (true=min, false=max)
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • probReachStrategy

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> probReachStrategy(CTMDP ctmdp,
                                                           int state,
                                                           java.util.BitSet target,
                                                           boolean min,
                                                           double[] lastSoln)
                                                    throws PrismException
        Construct strategy information for min/max reachability probabilities. (More precisely, list of indices of choices resulting in min/max.) (Note: indices are guaranteed to be sorted in ascending order.)
        Parameters:
        ctmdp - The CTMDP
        state - The state to generate strategy info for
        target - The set of target states to reach
        min - Min or max probabilities (true=min, false=max)
        lastSoln - Vector of values from which to recompute in one iteration
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Simple test program.
